SEARCH

Class ExpensesPortal

java.lang.Object
ExpensesPortal
public class ExpensesPortal extends Object
Manages a list of employee expenses. This class allows adding expenses, printing them, and summing their values (with support for multi-currency conversion).

      public ExpensesPortal()

  • Method Details

    • addExpense

      public void addExpense(Expense expense)
      Adds a new expense to the portal. This method validates that the expense amount is positive.
      Parameters:
      expense - The expense to be added
      Throws:
      InvalidExpenseAmount - if the expense amount is negative or zero

    • printExpenses

      public void printExpenses(ExpensePrinter printer)
      Prints the expenses using a provided ExpensePrinter.
      Parameters:
      printer - The printer implementation that defines how expenses are printed

    • getExpenses

      public List<Expense> getExpenses()
      Gets the list of expenses.
      Returns:
      A list of all expenses

    • sumExpenses

      public org.joda.money.Money sumExpenses()
      Sums the expenses and converts USD to EUR when necessary.
      Returns:
      The total sum of the expenses in EUR
